black_cards.text: Air Canada guidelines now prohibit ______ on airplanes.
Next on TSN: The World Series of ______.
O Canada, we stand on guard for ______.

What's the Canadian government using to inspire rural students to succeed?
When I am Prime Minister of Canada, I will create the Department ______.

title: Canadian Cards
description: Cards that are only found in the Canadian version.
